title: Genesis - Mama Tour (from laser disc)
description:
Genesis - Mama Tour (from laser disc)

I got this through a Google search. The seeding was terrible as it took 6 whole days to download. So upon finishing, i decided to put it out there myself and hopefully it'll go faster for others than it originally did for me.

This is, to me, the Holy Grail of Genesis concert videos. I have this packed away somewhere on VHS and haven't seen it in years till i grabbed it off the 'net. The video is exactly as it was on VHS with no extras. As is. Don't expect 2009 quality.

Title: Genesis - MAMA Tour (Japanese release)
Year: 1984
ISBN: SM068-3095

Chapters:
1. Abacab
2. That's All
3. Mama
4. Illegal Alien
5. Home by the Sea
6. Keep it Dark
7. It's Gonna Get Better
8. In the Cage (medley: Cinema Show/In that Quiet Earth/Colony of Slippermen/Afterglow)
9. Drum Duet
10. Turn it on Again (final medley)

Credit goes to the original creator of this torrent file, HALF-EATEN. His info text file is included intact.

So, without further ado.......



Comments always welcome.  ;-))
